scriptlets.name: noop.js
scriptlets.description: An empty script, often used as a redirect target to prevent a resource from loading or executing.

scriptlets.name: log.js
scriptlets.description: Logs messages to the console. Arguments: {{1}} message, [{{2}} log_level (info, warn, error)]

scriptlets.name: json-prune.js
scriptlets.description: Removes specified properties from JSON objects. Arguments: {{1}} path1, [{{2}} path2, ...]

scriptlets.name: hide-if-contains-image.js
scriptlets.description: Hides an element if it contains an image matching a source pattern. Arguments: {{1}} selector, {{2}} image_src_pattern

scriptlets.name: ubo-annoyance-fixer.js
scriptlets.description: A generic scriptlet for fixing common annoyances, equivalent to a known uBO scriptlet.

scriptlets.name: abort-on-property-read.js
scriptlets.description: Aborts script execution when a specific JS property is read. Argument: {{1}} property_path_to_watch

scriptlets.name: set-cookie.js
scriptlets.description: Sets a cookie. Arguments: {{1}} cookieName, {{2}} cookieValue, [{{3}} lifetimeInSeconds]

scriptlets.name: remove-attr.js
scriptlets.description: Removes an attribute from elements matching a selector. Arguments: {{1}} attributeName, {{2}} selector
